text: The Shina, Shin or Gilgiti are a Dardic ethnic group who live in Gilgit- Baltistan region of northern Pakistan. They live in the Gilgit region, while Baltis live in the Baltistan region. They speak Shina which is a Dardic language. The Shina migrated from Central Asia to South Asia during the second millennium BC. Some live in India, but they are still Muslims like the ones in Pakistan. ==References== Category:People from Gilgit-Baltistan
title: Shina people
